cards.name: Superior Alien Technology
cards.effect: You can purchase 'shoddy' tech. To do so, pay half price for a Keep card (rounding up) and mark it with a [UFO]. Before each turn, roll a die for each card that has a [UFO] counter on it. On a [Claw], discard the card. You can only have 3 cards with counters on them at a time.

cards.name: Mothership Support
cards.effect: Once on your turn you can spend 1 [Energy] to heal 1 damage. (Even if in Tokyo).

cards.name: Exotic Arms
cards.effect: Before you roll you can put 2 [Energy] on this card. If you do, and roll at least 3 [Claw], you can take back your 2 [Energy] and deal 2 extra damage. Otherwise, you lose your 2 [Energy] and take 2 damage.

cards.name: Funny Looking But Dangerous
cards.effect: When you score 2/2/2 you deal 1 damage to all other monsters. This doesn't count as an attack.

cards.name: Adapting Technology
cards.effect: Put 3 [Alien] counters on this Evolution. Spend a [Alien] counter to sweep the cards on your turn only. Discard this evolution when you spend the last counter.

cards.name: Anger Batteries
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to gain 1 [Energy] for each damage you take on the current turn.

cards.name: Precision Field Support
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to reveal cards from the deck until you reveal a Keep card that costs 4 [Energy] or less. Keep that card and discard the rest.

cards.name: Alien Scourge
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to gain 2 [Star].

cards.name: Twas Beauty Killed The Beast
cards.effect: Play this Evolution when you are in Tokyo. Gain 1 [Star] at the end of each monster's turn (including yours). You lose all your [Star] and this Evolution if you leave Tokyo.

cards.name: King Of Tokyo
cards.effect: Gain 1 extra [Star] when you take control of Tokyo or start your turn there.

cards.name: Alpha Male
cards.effect: Gain 1 [Star] when you attack.

cards.name: Chest Thumping
cards.effect: When you attack Tokyo you can force the occupant to retreat.

cards.name: Giant Banana
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to heal 2 damage.

cards.name: Jungle Frenzy
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to take an extra turn. Only do this when you have attacked Tokyo and have failed to enter Tokyo.

cards.name: Simian Scamper
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution when you retreat from Tokyo. You take no damage this turn.

cards.name: Monkey Rush
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution when another Monster takes control of Tokyo. You take control of it instead.

cards.name: Target Acquired
cards.effect: When a Monster attacks you, give him the [Target] counter (its former holder is no longer a target). When you deal any damage to the Monster who has the [Target] counter, deal 1 extra damage.

cards.name: Claws Of Steel
cards.effect: Deal 1 extra damage on a turn in which you dealt 3 or more damage.

cards.name: Lightning Armor
cards.effect: If you take damage, roll a die for each damage point. On a [Claw] the Monster whose turn it is takes 1 damage.

cards.name: Breath Of Doom
cards.effect: If you attack Tokyo, deal 1 damage to all other Monsters not in Tokyo.

cards.name: Tune-up
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution on your turn if you are not in Tokyo. Skip your turn but heal 4 damage and gain 2 [Energy].

cards.name: Programmed To Destroy
cards.effect: Gain 3 [Star] and 2 [Energy] whenever a Monster's health goes to 0 [Heart].

cards.name: Destructive Analysis
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to gain 1 [Energy] for each [Claw] you rolled.

cards.name: Mecha Blast
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to deal 2 extra damage.

cards.name: Dread Maw
cards.effect: When you damage a Monster with an attack, he loses 1 [Star].

cards.name: Sunken Temple
cards.effect: If you are not in Tokyo, you can skip your turn to heal 3 damage and gain 3 [Energy].

cards.name: Eater Of Souls
cards.effect: Gain 1 [Heart] when you enter Tokyo. You can have up to 12 [Heart].

cards.name: Terror Of The Deep
cards.effect: If you take damage, roll a die for each damage point. On a [Heart] you do not take that damage point.

cards.name: High Tide
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to count each [Heart] as 2 [Heart] for your turn.

cards.name: Cult Following
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to gain 1 [Star] for each [Heart] you rolled.

cards.name: Wave Of Ruin
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution when you take Tokyo. All other Monsters take 2 damage.

cards.name: Healing Rain
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to heal 2 damage.

cards.name: Tail Sweep
cards.effect: Each turn, you can change one of your dice to a [One] or a [Two].

cards.name: Gamma Breath
cards.effect: Each turn, you may change one of your dice to a [Claw].

cards.name: Heat Vision
cards.effect: Monsters you attack lose 1 [Star].

cards.name: Defender Of Tokyo
cards.effect: If you start your turn in Tokyo, all other Monsters lose 1 [Star].

cards.name: Saurian Adaptability
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to switch all your dice with one face of your choice to a different face of your choice. For example, you can make all your [Heart] results into [Three].

cards.name: Primal Bellow
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to make all other Monsters lose 2 [Star].

cards.name: Radioactive Waste
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to gain 2 [Energy] and to heal 1 damage.

cards.name: Detachable Tail
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to take no damage this turn.

cards.name: Electric Carrot
cards.effect: If you attack Monsters in Tokyo they must give you 1 [Energy] or take 1 extra damage.

cards.name: Lupine Power Blade
cards.effect: Before you roll you can pay 2 [Energy] to activate this card. If you do, add 1 extra damage to your attack, and gain 1 [Energy] for each [Claw].

cards.name: He Who Dies With The Most Toys Wins!
cards.effect: Gain 1 [Star] each time you purchase a Keep card.

cards.name: Rabbit Laboratory
cards.effect: Cards cost 1 [Energy] less (Minimum 0).

cards.name: Prince With 1000 Enemies
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to reroll a die belonging to another player. Take this back into your hand if you enter Tokyo.

cards.name: Decoy Bunny
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to take no damage this turn.

cards.name: Hare Style
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to gain 3 [Energy].

cards.name: Fuzzy Logic
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to gain as much [Energy] as you have already gained this turn.

cards.name: Yin & Yang
cards.effect: After you finish rolling you can choose to flip all your dice to the opposite side.

cards.name: Pandarinism: Survival Of The Cutest
cards.effect: Gain1 [Star] for triple [Heart], plus 1 extra [Star] for each extra [Heart]. You still gain the other benefits associated with [Heart].

cards.name: Bamboo Supply
cards.effect: At the start of each turn, you can add 1 [Energy] on this card, OR take all the [Energy] off this card.

cards.name: Panda Express
cards.effect: If you roll [One] [Two] [Three] [Heart] [Claw] [Energy], you gain 2 [Star] and get to take another turn. All other results still count.

cards.name: Bear Necessities
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to lose 1 [Star], gain 2 [Energy], and heal 2 damage.

cards.name: Bam Boozle
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution when someone purchases a card. Return the card they purchased and [Energy] they spent. You choose a card they can afford to purchase, and they purchase that card.

cards.name: Eats, Shoots And Leaves
cards.effect: Can only be played on the same turn you take control of Tokyo, discard this Evolution to do an extra attack after entering Tokyo that deals 2 damage, and to gain 1 [Energy], then exit Tokyo. No Monster takes your place.

cards.name: Panda Monium
cards.effect: Discard this Evolution to gain 6 [Energy]. All other Monsters gain 3 [Energy].
